title: 2016 NA CS Summer Qualifiers Format
body: Just like in Spring, the Open Qualifier will consist of a single elimination, Best of 3 (Bo3) tournament, where the top two teams advance to the Qualifier Finals on May 25 against 5th and 6th seeds from 2016 NA CS Spring Split, Dream Team and Enemy, in Bo5 matches to claim spots in the 2016 NA CS Summer Split .

replies.body: This can't POSSIBLY  go wrong, be exploited, etc.

> [{quoted}](name=RobotEthanMars,realm=NA,application-id=9hBQwnEU,discussion-id=0iJKYZ0q,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-04-05T02:34:44.026+0000)
>
> This can't POSSIBLY  go wrong, be exploited, etc.

Everything can go wrong or be exploited- it's a matter of how easy it is, how likely it is, and how much harm it can do.  Our job is to limit those three things.

More than happy to chat in more detail if that's what you're interested in. =)
What week does the qualifier start? Registration ends on the 19th, do the matches start directly after?
So you're saying you do not want my team that consist of 1 bronze, 2 silver, and 2 gold. :(

This is crazy. There's a real chance DIG can be in the CS come Summer. They've been around since the beginning of LOL and autopromoted to the LCS as the #2 team in NA from season 2. 

Them being gone all of a sudden will be weird. If they do go it'll be for NA what losing SK was for EU. SK was the EU DIG in the ranking regards. Chance or a sign? Tune in this Wednesday to find out!
